Articles.Content: So, I'll start by saying that I'm SUPER excited for the next update. But, (if you haven't already, if you have, pretend you never saw this) PLEASE add 2.5 meter and .625 meter science bays. That is all.
^ +1 I would hate having to build a bigger probe than I need too too accommodate a science modual
+1 more. Smaller is better when launching some hairbrained atmosphere probe to Jool. Larger is better on space station assembly. Orbital Science!

Oh yeah, definitely! I hope that we can have variations of almost any part in any size. I was very very happy when they added the new Rockomax 48-7S engine, because you don't always want two radially mounted.
Shouldn't we wait until the update is actually released? We don't know that squad didn't do that. It's seems fairly obvious that they would given the smaller probe parts they added last time.
just cause we didn't see any different sized ones doesn't mean they don't exist, could be that they wanna supprise us.

Personally I feel like the big science thing is too tall, something ASAS sized as opposed to small fuel tank sized would work better. (don't ask me if there are other sizes, I couldn't tell you even if I knew)

Even if this update only has the one science module, didn't they say there'd be more science parts in the future? I don't know, I figured that whatever they implement into the next update would be just basic stuff to get the ball rolling and make sure the R&D stuff works for everyone and is enjoyable, more or less. After that, they'll probably toss in new parts every other patch or so...or just have a big functional parts patch someday. Who knows? Either way, it's a bit too early to be requesting things like this.
